name: Sydney for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Sydney is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Kaunas, Lithuania, Sydney felt in love often. She loved to go on a date, to get flowers and go for a walk under the moon. And sometimes happened very funny stories which Sydney remember for the whole her life.

Sydney literally “fell” for this guy. It happened at school. Since her crush sits behind Sydney in class, when they stood up to do the pledge Sydney stood up too fast and she stumbled over to him so to not fall on the ground Sydney reached to grab his desk but she accidentally GRABBED HIM and Sydney fell on this guy and they both screamed. Luckily Sydney didn’t hurt or crush him. Their teacher and everyone else started laughing and both, Sydney and this guy, got so red afterwards. After that incident, when pupils stand up for the pledge, he always moved all the way to the back of the room away from Sydney…

Sydney had a lot of dates in her life and she has a lot of funny stories in her arsenal.

Help Sydney to take her place on the street!

short_description: Sydney is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
